description:
Llama ... get it?! We don't believe in taking life too seriously, and neither does this tongue-in-cheek Journeyman graphic tee.

What we do take seriously, though, is the sourcing and quality of our clothing, which is why this lightweight, super breathable t-shirt is made from a sustainable fabric that feels as good on your skin as it does good for the planet. Now how do you say llama again?
name: Prana Como Te Llama Journeyman 2 - Slim - Mens
